alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued November 26 at 3:17PM EST until November 27 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (11.4 to 13.1 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA and Suffolk MA Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding occurs along Morrissey Boulevard in Boston. Coastal flooding is expected along the North Shore from Marblehead northward along the coast to Newburyport. The combination of high tides and large swells will result in flooding of some immediate coastal roads and some road closures are anticipated. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
